messages.message: The farmers keep this place pretty safe, what did you do!?
Beware the witch of the red wood, she is kind and reclusive
Star magic uncover many kinds of dirty secrets
Living trees can be very grumpy, best avoid them
Don’t go taking my shiny bits. If something is in my field it’s mine!.
All these witches and wizards digging around, they better leave my shiny bits alone.
How nice to see a new face.  I hope you’re the first of many.
She has the same sparkling energy as that other girl from years ago.
Haha! You can hear me and you’re not scared!
I am terrible at this job.  Guess it's still the best one for a pumpkin headed strawman.
Those hay piles burn up quick, but I'm safe here in the fire proof wheat.
Hello princess, I hear your kind love completing tasks.
Bring me 5 red apples and I will fit you with a dress from my coven.
These look perfect!  As we agreed, here is your dress.
I always enjoyed watching the stars twinkle across the sky.  Good luck.
No peeking into my heart princess. Respect the woods and I will gladly share them.
